title: 第 9 集 爸爸的眼镜不见了! | Daddy Loses his Glasses!

data.zh: 爸爸的眼镜不见了!
data.en: Daddy Loses his Glasses!

data.zh: 猪爸爸常戴着眼镜。
data.en: Daddy Pig wears glasses.

data.zh: 他需要戴着眼镜才能看得清楚。
data.en: He needs to wear glasses to see clearly.

data.zh: 当猪爸爸戴着眼镜时，一切都看得很清楚。
data.en: When Daddy Pig wears his glasses, everything looks fine.

data.zh: 但是当猪爸爸摘下眼镜时。。。。。。他就看不清了。
data.en: But when Daddy Pig takes his glasses off......he can't see things clearly.

data.zh: 所有的东西看上去都很模糊。
data.en: Everything looks a bit soft and fuzzy.

data.zh: 所以，对于猪爸爸来说，知道他的眼镜在哪是很重要的。
data.en: So, it is very important that Daddy Pig knows where his glasses are.

data.zh: 有时，猪爸爸会找不到他的眼镜。
data.en: Sometimes, Daddy Pig loses his glasses.

data.zh: 佩奇，乔治。你们看到爸爸的眼镜了吗？
data.en: Peppa, George. Have you seen Daddy Pig's glasses?

data.zh: 他到处找也找不到。
data.en: He can't find them anywhere.

data.zh: 没有，妈妈。
data.en: No, Mummy.

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治不知道猪爸爸的眼镜在哪。
data.en: Peppa and George do not know where Daddy Pig's glasses are.

data.zh: 哦，糟糕。猪爸爸没有眼镜什么都看不到
data.en: Oh, dear. Daddy Pig cannot see a thing without them

data.zh: 这让他很焦躁的。
data.en: and it makes him very grumpy.

data.zh: 没有眼镜，猪爸爸不能看报纸。
data.en: Without his glasses on, Daddy Pig cannot read his newspaper.

data.zh: 真可笑！我什么也看不到！
data.en: This is ridiculous! I can't see anything!

data.zh: 一定是有人将我的眼镜藏起来了。
data.en: Somebody must have put my glasses somewhere.

data.zh: 你还记得你最后把他们放哪了吗，猪爸爸？
data.en: Do you remember where you last put them, Daddy Pig?

data.zh: 当我不戴时，我总是把眼镜放在我的口袋里。
data.en: When I don't wear them, I always put them in my pocket.

data.zh: 但是它现在不在口袋里。
data.en: But they aren't there now.

data.zh: 爸爸！我们能帮你一起找眼镜吗？
data.en: Daddy! Can we help find your glasses?

data.zh: 好主意，佩奇。
data.en: Good idea, Peppa.

data.zh: 如果你找到了，
data.en: If you find them,

data.zh: 爸爸就不再焦躁了。
data.en: Daddy will stop being so grumpy.

data.zh: 我没有焦躁。
data.en: I'm not grumpy.

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治开始找爸爸的眼镜了。
data.en: Peppa and George are looking for Daddy's glasses.

data.zh: 佩奇找了报纸下面。
data.en: Peppa looks under the newspaper.

data.zh: 但是猪爸爸的眼镜不在那里。
data.en: But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there.

data.zh: 哦。
data.en: Oh.

data.zh: 乔治找了电视机的上面。
data.en: George looks on top of the television.

data.zh: 但是猪爸爸的眼镜也不在那里。
data.en: But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there.

data.zh: 哦。
data.en: Oh.

data.zh: 让我们上楼去妈妈和爸爸的卧室找找！
data.en: Let's look upstairs in Mummy and Daddy's bedroom!

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治开始在猪妈妈和猪爸爸的卧室里找。
data.en: Peppa and George are looking in Mummy and Daddy Pig's bedroom.

data.zh: 乔治。。。小心点，不要碰倒东西了。
data.en: George... be careful not to knock anything over.

data.zh: 这一点也不好笑。
data.en: It's not funny.

data.zh: 佩奇找了枕头底下。
data.en: Peppa looks under the pillows.

data.zh: 但是猪爸爸的眼镜不在那。
data.en: But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there.

data.zh: 哦。
data.en: Oh.

data.zh: 乔治找了爸爸的拖鞋。
data.en: George looks in Daddy's slippers.

data.zh: 但是眼镜也不在那。
data.en: But the glasses are not there, either.

data.zh: 让我们去浴室找找！
data.en: Let's look in the bathroom!

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治开始在浴室找。
data.en: Peppa and George are looking in the bathroom.

data.zh: 眼镜不在浴缸里。
data.en: The glasses are not in the bath.

data.zh: 眼镜也不在厕所里。
data.en: The glasses are not in the toilet.

data.zh: 唔！太难找了。
data.en: Hmm ! It's too difficult.

data.zh: 佩奇和乔治到处找都没找到猪爸爸的眼镜。
data.en: Peppa and George cannot find Daddy Pig's glasses anywhere.

data.zh: 我们已经到处找了。
data.en: We've looked everywhere.

data.zh: 但是我们没有找到爸爸的眼镜。
data.en: But we can't find Daddy's glasses.

data.zh: 哦，糟了。现在，我们该怎么办？
data.en: Oh, dear. Now, what can we do?

data.zh: 我想我只有适应没有眼镜的生活。。。
data.en: I suppose I'll just have to learn to do without them...

data.zh: 如果走得慢，我不会撞到东西的。
data.en: If I move slowly, I won't bump into things.

data.zh: 在这里！爸爸的眼镜！
data.en: There they are! Daddy's glasses!

data.zh: 猪爸爸。原来你一直坐在眼镜上面！
data.en: Daddy Pig. You were sitting on them all the time!

data.zh: 糊涂的爸爸！
data.en: Silly Daddy!

data.zh: 我不知道它怎么会跑到那里去的。
data.en: I don't know how they got there.

data.zh: 我很好奇是怎么回事！
data.en: I wonder how!

data.zh: 好吧，你的确有点糊涂，
data.en: Well, you may have been a bit silly,

data.zh: 猪爸爸，但至少你不会焦躁了！
data.en: Daddy Pig, but at least you're not grumpy anymore!

data.zh: 我没有焦躁。
data.en: I was not grumpy.
